name: FINDING HOTTO
description:
You are a private investigator and a new client has hired you to look into the kidnapping of his cat Hotto.

You need to  interview his friends in the LGBT community riding in Ubers around town before your money runs out  or your bladder explodes.

If you feel lucky there is a Casino to help you get some funds.

Solve the case , save kitty and have fun.
